meanings.definition: The act of adding something extra to something else.
meanings.sent1: The superaddition of sprinkles on top of the ice cream made it even more delicious.
meanings.sent2: She made a superaddition of more flowers to the bouquet to make it look fuller.
meanings.sent3: The superaddition of whipped cream on the cake made it look like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: His generosity was like a superaddition of sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The superaddition of colorful stickers to her notebook made it stand out.

meanings.definition: An additional amount or quantity added to something.
meanings.sent1: The superaddition of extra cheese on the pizza made it even tastier.
meanings.sent2: The superaddition of more books to the library expanded its collection.
meanings.sent3: The superaddition of a new toy to his collection brought a big smile to his face.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a superaddition of joy to the room.
meanings.sent5: The superaddition of colorful balloons to the party decorations added a festive touch.
